snippet: The European Union must step in to help Italy, which has been rescuing thousands of migrants at sea and shouldering the costs.
abstract: Editorial urges European Union to take ownership of Mare Nostrum, Italian marine rescue operation set up after boat full of African migrants sank of the coast of Italy in 2013, with 350 lives lost; holds United States and EU must work with African governments and United Nations to address causes and consequences of desperate migration.
lead_paragraph: The European Union must step in to help Italy, which has been rescuing thousands of migrants at sea and shouldering the costs.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
